name: Raccoon to the Moon!
description:
Play around in the garbage like a real Trash Panda! 

A little rage platformer I've been toying around with.  Very incomplete, but fun enough to play.  A and D to move, space to jump.  Works best with an Xbox One Controller (Left stick, A button).  

He's a cute little scamp isn't he?

Trash cans are checkpoints!
